text: Elizabeth "Scotti" Lechuga ( Wilborne; born January 7, 1983) is an American former professional racing cyclist, who rode professionally between 2014 and 2018 for the , , and teams. In 2018, Lechuga stepped away from racing and now runs Leborne Coaching, with husband Ernie Lechuga. ==Personal life== She is married to former pro racer Ernie Lechuga and they have two sons. ==See also== * List of 2015 UCI Women's Teams and riders ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American female cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Scotti Lechuga
